question: Choose the correct form of the verb: She ___ to the store every Saturday.
Which word is a synonym for 'happy'?
Fill in the blank: They have been friends ___ childhood.
Choose the correctly punctuated sentence.
options: A) It's time to eat, grandma.
B) Its time to eat grandma.
C) It's time to eat grandma.
D) Its time to eat, grandma.

question: Choose the correct preposition: She is good ___ playing the piano.
Identify the adjective in the following sentence: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Which sentence is in the passive voice?
options: A) The chef cooked a delicious meal.
B) A delicious meal was cooked by the chef.
C) The chef is cooking a meal.
D) The chef will cook a meal.

question: Choose the correct plural form: One child, two ___
Select the correct conditional sentence:
options: A) If I was rich, I would travel the world.
B) If I am rich, I would travel the world.
C) If I were rich, I would travel the world.
D) If I will be rich, I would travel the world.
